name: LittleSprigsPodcast
0:
”Alexa, ask Little Sprigs to play the latest episode”
”Alexa, ask Little Sprigs for the latest episode”
”Alexa, ask Little Sprigs to play the Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: little sprigs
des: Welcome to The Little Sprigs Podcast, hosted by Christina Rochelle. On this podcast, you'll find a mix of interviews and recordings focusing on early childhood education, communication, mindfulness. Follow me on social @littlesprigs to keep up with the latest and say 'Hey'
